programme.title: Awkward Sexy People
programme.desc: Jeff and Anne, two close friends and co-workers in a suburban high school, are embarrassingly unlucky at love. With nothing else to lose, they hatch a plan to transform themselves over the course of a sex-and-alcohol-fueled summer into the cool, confident people they aspire to be. At first an exhilarating adventure of self-discovery, Jeff and Anne's journey turns into a laugh-out-loud experiment as they lose their identities, their dignity, and quite possibly each other.

programme.title: My Art
programme.desc: Ellie Shine (Laurie Simmons) is a single artist living in New York City. Ellie has a good life: a stable teaching job, successful friends, and a loyal, aging dog named Bing. As her decades-old dream of a respectable place in the art world becomes more elusive, her frustration with her lack of recognition feels alarmingly urgent. When she is offered the summer house and studio of a famous friend she seizes the opportunity to hit the reset button on her life and work. She unwittingly finds inspiration in two out-of-work actors who maintain the gardens at her summer retreat.

programme.title: Unlikely Hero
programme.desc: A coming-of-middle-age comedy starring Jeff Daniels, Ryan Reynolds and Emma Stone. Richard Dunn (Daniels). Unlikely Hero chronicles the unlikely friendship between failed author Richard Dunne and a Long Island teen who teaches him a thing or two about growing up, all under the disapproving eye of his long-suffering wife and his imaginary Superhero friend.

programme.title: All Things Valentine
programme.desc: A blogger who has had terrible luck on Valentine's Day meets a handsome veterinarian. Then she finds out he is the one who has been leaving rude comments on her Valentine’s Day articles and she questions if her luck has changed at all.

programme.title: Basmati Blues
programme.desc: Linda Watt (Brie Larson: Room, 21 Jump Street) is a sheltered but brilliant young scientist who is plucked out of her company's lab and sent to India by her CEO (Donald Sutherland: The Hunger Games) to sell "Rice 9," a genetically modified rice she's created.

programme.title: Living The Change
programme.desc: Living the Change explores solutions to the global crises we face today through the inspiring stories of people pioneering change in their own lives and in their communities in order to live in a sustainable and regenerative way.

programme.title: American Loneliness
programme.desc: American Loneliness tells the story of filmmaker Mathieu Le Lay’s solitary journey into one of the most attractive areas on the planet : the American West. His journey consisted of a six week adventure backpacking through Colorado, Wyoming, Montana and Washington. From snowstorms in Yellowstone to the Wild Pacific coast, this is the story of his quest for freedom and the great outdoors.

programme.title: Nation On Fire
programme.desc: Kyiv, the Ukrainian capital, has been gripped by unrest in recent times. This is a unique portrait of a nation in suspense, a nation in fear, a nation in waiting. A rare and exclusive snapshot of the days after the riots but before the storm.

programme.title: Good, Better, Vegan?
programme.desc: Veganism is the new lifestyle of a young, healthy generation. Restaurants serve vegan haute cuisine, recipes for vegan cakes flood the Internet. It’s also a money-making area for research and business. Countless ways of replacing milk, eggs and sausage enter the market. But few realize that the manufacturing process involves biotechnology and additives. Being vegan without knowing about nutrients can lead to deficiencies, even death. Are we really on the threshold of a new, sustainable diet?

programme.title: Karun
programme.desc: Karun: Misadventures On Iran’s Longest River' - British adventurers Tom Allen and Leon McCarron set out to follow Iran’s longest river, the Karun, by human powered means. Their aim is to go beyond the politics and explore the culture and geography of this most misunderstood of nations and have a great adventure doing so. But despite Tom’s previous experience of travel in Iran, they find that cultural differences run deeper than they’d realised.

programme.title: Aina
programme.desc: ‘ĀINA: That Which Feeds Us’ – The best-kept secret on Kaua`i isn’t a secluded beach or local surf spot, it’s that four of the world’s largest chemical companies are using the island as an open-air testing ground for pesticides on genetically modified crops. Winner Accolades Global Film Competition.

programme.title: Ancient Grains - Quinoa
programme.desc: When you open your pantry, do images of the rugged mountains of South America, the colorful tablelands of Africa and the fertile river valleys of the Middle East dance before your eyes? If not, you have yet to discover amaranth, quinoa, spelt, kamut and teff, the quintet of nutritional powerhouses known as the ancient grains. The legends behind their origins many millennia past, their loss over time and their ultimate modern revival - literally tell the story of civilization.

programme.title: Traceable
programme.desc: In a world filled with throw-away fashion, emerging designer Laura Siegel’s dream is to shift the perspectives of consumers and connect them to the hands that craft her garments. Follow this idealistic designer as she travels across India to produce her collection. But will positioning her collection in the sustainable domain enable her to survive in the highly competitive fashion industry?

programme.title: Cromwells Head
programme.desc: The story of Oliver Cromwell's head is perhaps the most bizarre, yet least well known, of all tales from English history. From regal burial, to exhumation and decapitation, this relic of our only non-royal ruler has travelled a most peculiar path.

programme.title: Great British Aircraft
programme.desc: Britain has always played a very important role in the aeronautic industry, from Sir George Cayley who designed the first actual model of an aeroplane to Sir Frank Whittle who is credited with single handedly inventing the turbojet engine.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. But in 1993 a Zambian Air Force ditches into the ocean about 500 metres offshore from Gabon. All passengers, including 18 players, die in the accident.The Chipolopolo's captain, Kalusha Bwalya, who is not aboard the ill-fated flight puts his efforts to build a new team and make a professional federation becoming later the national team coach and president of the Football Association of Zambia. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka grew up poor and at times homeless in the streets of Brazzaville. His mom died when he was 7. His dad was in prison when he was 12. Despite these overwhelming obstaces he achieved his dream of becoming an NBA Champion. This documentary follows Serge on his journey home to the Republic of Congo, to show them the NBA Championship trophy but more importantly he shares a message that through hard work and determination, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Ride Your Dream
programme.desc: Motorcycling was a man’s world, until now. This documentary introduces us to Ana Carrasco, the Spanish rider who has revolutionised the two wheels’ world and who, from an early age, had a clear dream: being world champion. Through intimate conversations with her family and team, we get to know Ana’s motivations, the obstacles she has faced and the dreams she keeps chasing. Her career, from its origins in a small town in Murcia to being the first woman to win the World Championship, is a source of inspiration for anyone. Ana herself is a clear example of overcoming struggle and tenacity, and her story which is full of exciting moments encourages us all to fight for our dreams.

programme.title: Inside Kilian Jornet
programme.desc: For Kilian Jornet, the world's greatest mountain athlete, the arrival of his thirties coincided with the best and worst year of his life. This documentary follows Jornet through an intense 10-day tour of 10 cities around the world, allowing the public to see, for the first time, everything that goes on around the professional athlete, and revealing his lesser-known, uninhibited side. Between presentations, interviews, and brand commitments, and with only a few hours' sleep, the athlete reflects on a year marked by injuries his search for the balance between competition and personal projects and the arrival of his first daughter.

programme.title: The Secrets of La Roja – World Champions 2010
programme.desc: On the 11th July 2010, Spain’s national team reached its goal of winning the World Cup, a victory that was felt by the team and nation as a whole. Despite this successful ending, “La Roja” had to overcome various struggles and difficulties in order to become legendary. The team arrived in South Africa with the triumph of the 2008 European Football Championship under their belt and Vicente del Bosque leading the way. There was a general feeling of favoritism attributed to ""La Roja"" and while the defeat against Switzerland in the first match came as a shock, it motivated Del Bosque and his team to come together and focus on one intention: good football and one goal: to make history.

programme.title: Eighteam
programme.desc: The Chipolopolo is the Zambia national team that at the 1988 Olympic thrashes Italy 4-0 and has their eyes on the Africa Cup of Nations. Two decades later, destiny makes Zambia a blink: in Gabon, Zambia becomes African champions for the first time after a long penalty shoot-out. There are 18 penalties.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, The Unexpected Hero
programme.desc: This is the story of a normal person who does extraordinary things. Someone who pursues and achieves triumphs through taking care of the small details, because these are, after all, the ones that make him a different soccer player. We all know the Iniesta-magician of the ball, who conquered two triplets with Barça and raised the World Champion Cup with the Spanish National Team. And yes, of course we know their great sporting moments. But who is behind this global sport superstar? Through exceptional witnesses such as Leo Messi, Neymar Jr., Pep Guardiola, Sergio Ramos, Luis Enrique and a long etc.

programme.title: Killer in the Caves
programme.desc: About 6.5 million bats have died in the last six years in North America. A disease is driving the Little Brown Bats to extinction and causes mass mortalities among other bat species. The epidemic is still a riddle, but bat-experts piece together information like criminal investigators. The ingenuity of the scientists is captured through astonishing experiments and groundbreaking technology in an effort to understand this mysterious disease and learn more about this common yet unknown animal.

programme.title: Aina
programme.desc: ‘ĀINA: That Which Feeds Us’ – The best-kept secret on Kaua`i isn’t a secluded beach or local surf spot, it’s that four of the world’s largest chemical companies are using the island as an open-air testing ground for pesticides on genetically modified crops. Winner Accolades Global Film Competition.

programme.title: Antarctica - A Year On Ice

programme.title: Alien Trespass
programme.desc: After crash landing on the outskirts of a desert town, an alien enlists the help of a local waitress to recapture a monster that has escaped the wreckage of his spaceship in this affectionate, knowing, hilarious send-up of a genreís sillier past.

programme.title: Al Murray - One Man, One Guvnor
programme.desc: The Pub Landlord is back to save the nation, in this, his latest stand-up extravaganza, because he knows what the country really needs right now is some bloke waving a pint around offering common sense solutions. Join the Guv as he sets out the manifesto for his Guv'norment, sorts out the world's financial system and fixes the NHS, all while pulling the perfectly poured pint. So charge your glasses (remember, pint for the fella, glass of white wine or fruit based drink for the lady) and join The Pub Landlord in celebrating 20 years at the lager top in this brand new stand up show.

programme.title: On A Clear Day
programme.desc: Frank (Peter Mullan) is a hard-working 55 year-old, respected in his local community, who suddenly finds himself without a job. For the first time in his life, Frank is without direction. When his friend Danny (Billy Boyd) jokes that on a clear day he could swim to France, an idea is planted in Frank\’s mind. Concealing his plans from his loving wife Joan (Brenda Blethyn) Frank determines to put his life back together by attempting the ultimate test of endurance – to swim the English Channel. In doing so he cements a broken relationship with his grown-up son.

programme.title: Guardian of the Highlands
programme.desc: Sean Connery brings to life Sir Billi, a skateboarding veterinarian and number one grandpa. He channels the spirit of 007 James Bond to go above and beyond the call of duty and rescue a goat who thinks he's a dog, an admiral who's afraid of the water, and a beaver who was raised by rabbits. This heart-warming story is packed with enough stunts, skydiving, and car chases to keep the whole family on the edge of their seats.

programme.title: Guardian of the Highlands
programme.desc: Sean Connery brings to life Sir Billi, a skateboarding veterinarian and number one grandpa. He channels the spirit of 007 James Bond to go above and beyond the call of duty and rescue a goat who thinks he's a dog, an admiral who's afraid of the water, and a beaver who was raised by rabbits. This heart-warming story is packed with enough stunts, skydiving, and car chases to keep the whole family on the edge of their seats.

programme.title: Alien Trespass
programme.desc: After crash landing on the outskirts of a desert town, an alien enlists the help of a local waitress to recapture a monster that has escaped the wreckage of his spaceship in this affectionate, knowing, hilarious send-up of a genreís sillier past.

programme.title: Al Murray - One Man, One Guvnor
programme.desc: The Pub Landlord is back to save the nation, in this, his latest stand-up extravaganza, because he knows what the country really needs right now is some bloke waving a pint around offering common sense solutions. Join the Guv as he sets out the manifesto for his Guv'norment, sorts out the world's financial system and fixes the NHS, all while pulling the perfectly poured pint. So charge your glasses (remember, pint for the fella, glass of white wine or fruit based drink for the lady) and join The Pub Landlord in celebrating 20 years at the lager top in this brand new stand up show.

programme.title: On A Clear Day
programme.desc: Frank (Peter Mullan) is a hard-working 55 year-old, respected in his local community, who suddenly finds himself without a job. For the first time in his life, Frank is without direction. When his friend Danny (Billy Boyd) jokes that on a clear day he could swim to France, an idea is planted in Frank\’s mind. Concealing his plans from his loving wife Joan (Brenda Blethyn) Frank determines to put his life back together by attempting the ultimate test of endurance – to swim the English Channel. In doing so he cements a broken relationship with his grown-up son.

programme.title: Buried Cain
programme.desc: Five childhood friends try to keep their love lives and their past, from destroying their friendship as adults. Lies and secrets hold them together until Georgia returns home. Now, they must ask themselves-how far they will go for love?

programme.title: B-Sides
programme.desc: B-Sides covers Austin City Limits 2021 featuring interviews with performers Zella Day, AG Club, and Surfaces.

programme.title: Laura McKenzie's Traveler
programme.desc: Malta- Laura visits a re-enactment of La Guardia, which represents a military performance that used to take place in the time of the Knights of St. John. Plus, the walled city of Mdina then Valletta Gozo, The Blue Grotto, St. Paul's Catacombs, and the Temple of Hagar Qim. Finally, Laura rounds out her trip with an excursion to Ggantia, the oldest free-standing structure in the world.

programme.title: Lords of the Mafia
programme.desc: The Mafia in Italy Today- Reestablishing their ties to the ancestral homeland, American Mafiosi have rediscovered an old partner in crime. In Palermo, local crime bosses have moved into the big time by supplying New York mobsters with heroin from Pakistan and Afghanistan. The Sicilians and Neapolitan Camorra criminals have become rich and powerful, and now influence business and government in Rome. At the top of the heap sits Salvatore Reina, boss of bosses.

programme.title: Real Vice Cops
programme.desc: Ride-along access from local police agencies and clearance to the highest profile cases that chronicles the exploits of REAL vice squads all across the United States. In cities like Memphis, Las Vegas, Miami, Detroit, Atlanta, Dallas and Orlando our crews ride along with these urban warriors, and plunge the viewer into the action right along with them.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Pt.2-Repo Men will take you to the front lines of the ongoing war between car lenders and delinquent debtors. Witness firsthand behind-the-scenes planning and successful execution of a wide variety of auto repossessions. Ride along on high-risk, night repossession and see all the close calls and the latest technology including the development of a covert cache of electronic and security devices.

programme.title: Backpack Sheki, Azerbaijan

programme.title: Backpack Alexandria, Egypt

programme.title: Off The Grid Nubra valley, ladakh

programme.title: Kissed by the Sea Penghu Island, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex visits Taiwan’s Penghu island, starting his day with a swim, later trying out a vermicelli noodle delicacy and visiting the Penghu Mazu temple. Further, taking a boat ride he visits the Chimei island, exploring and interacting with the locals and trying water activities. Finally indulging himself with the locals playing volleyball.

programme.title: Backpack Split & Salona, Croatia
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite learns about the Roman history of Croatia at Split, the second largest city in Croatia. She also visits the ruins of Salona.

programme.title: Off The Grid Suru Valley, India
programme.desc: Alex explores Munshi Aziz Bhat Museum displaying the lives of the people, influenced by the traders and travels further on the way to Srinagar. She admires the beauty of Mt. Kun and Nun Kun glacier.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus Khirokitia
programme.desc: While visiting Khirokitia, Sabrina experiences Greek culture in Lefkara village, and uncovers the historical old town and beautiful beaches of Paphos.

programme.title: Backpack Cairo, Egypt
programme.desc: Sabrina enjoys her backpacking journey in Egypt from the capital Cairo, painted in the shades of ancient islamic and modern architecture. Marveled at the Pyramids, exploring the necropolis of Giza, she ends her day after a river cruise on the Nile.

programme.title: It Takes a Thief
programme.desc: Single females, Marlene and Katrina see the madness in their security methods as they protect their unlocked home in a wholly unorthodox manner. Resident thief John shows them how their own security ideas can work precariously against them!

programme.title: ICEolation
programme.desc: Antarctica is a place few get to visit, let alone connect with. This is the story of two paddlers with adventurous spirits, whom when presented with an unique opportunity to undertake a self-supported sea kayak expedition in Antarctica, took it. Took it as an opportunity to go beyond adrenalin-based desires and the pleasing of engorged ego’s and instead explore as much within themselves as explore the magical, ice-littered waterways of the Antarctic Peninsula. Throughout the narrative, the theme of the film – connection – is woven in, along with an insight into the preparations necessary for an expedition of this magnitude. Together with candid images of the complexities of daily life in this unique environment, this story aims to inspire other adventurous folk to do more than explore just the physical realm of whatever incredible wilderness they next find themselves in. For there really is so much more to explore. Finalist - VIMFF 2020. Winner - World Tour Paddling Film Festival 2020. Best NZ Made Film - New Zealand Mountain Film 2019. Finalist - Audience Awards 2019. Official Selection 2020: Nature Track Film Festival. Official Selections 2019: Adventure Outdoor Fest, Adventure Shorts Film Festival, Cradle Mountain Film Festival, Kendal Mountain Film Festival, Polar Film Festival, AMA.

programme.title: Ancient Splendors of Rome
programme.desc: Two major events occurred in the same period 2,000 years ago. The Colosseum, the largest human-made structure on the earth, was completed (AD 80), and Pompeii disappeared from history in one day due to the explosion of Vesuvius Volcano (AD79), the largest disaster on earth that mankind suffered. These two events serve as precious windows to understand the whole political culture and economic society of Rome, the Millennium Empire, beyond time and space.

programme.title: Doomsday Volcanoes
programme.desc: April, 2010 and a relatively small Icelandic volcano turns much of the Northern Hemisphere into an ash-strewn no-fly zone. From Miami to Moscow flights are grounded, hundreds of thousands of people are stranded, but Eyjafjallajkull was just the start.

programme.title: The Last Dukes
programme.desc: Dukedoms are created by the Monarch - for reasons ranging from a grateful nation rewarding a major war leader to a king acknowledging his illegitimate son. The last Dukedom to be created was by Queen Victoria. As they gradually become extinct, what will become of those that remain? Do they still have power and wealth? What is it to be a Duke in the 21st Century?

programme.title: The Family Who Vanished
programme.desc: Mr Chohan had a successful business worth £5m. Kenneth Regan was known as Captain Cash from his drug dealing days, and along with his two henchmen, they hatched a plot to take over the Chohan’s business and use it to front their drug smuggling ring. Mr Chohan, his young wife, her mother, and the couple’s two baby sons were lured into a trap and brutally murdered, covered up as an innocent but tragic sudden disappearance. The plot was only foiled by a family murder in New Zealand, refusing to believe that they would all vanish, as a result of tax avoidance or a business agreement gone sour. The bodies of the three adults washed up along the coasts of the UK, but the two babies were never found.

programme.title: The Murder of John Lennon
programme.desc: Crimes of the Century revisits the shocking 1980 murder of former Beatle John Lennon who was shot repeatedly in the back by assassin Mark David Chapman as he was returning to his apartment. Chapman surrenders to the police and is eventually sent to prison for life.

programme.title: Seeing the Beginning of Time
programme.desc: A cutting-edge film based on the work of scientists opening a powerful new window into deep space. Using high-tech telescopes we can now capture light across wide swathes of the universe and channel a vast flow of cosmic data into supercomputer models to probe the forces and events that shaped it. What can we learn about the origin of galaxies like the Milky Way, and of worlds like our own?

programme.title: Dr Death: Harold Shipman
programme.desc: Britain’s biggest serial killer was a doctor, Dr Harold Shipman. Unsuspected for many years, Dr. Shipman selected his victims from his patient list. There were clues, but who in the community would believe that a doctor would kill his patients? Suspected of killing over 350 people during his career, it was clumsy attempts at forging the will of one of his victims in his own favour that alerted the police and led to his arrest. Found guilty at his trial and jailed for life, Dr Shipman committed suicide never accepting his guilt.

programme.title: Catching Killers
programme.desc: In Alabama, Detectives Kent Quinnie and Michael Shavers bust a preacher that murders his wife, and then uses the bible to seduce her kids. And in Kansas, Detectives Dan Owsley and Dave Brown use every trick in the book to catch the world’s first Internet serial killer.

programme.desc: A collection of short films set in different times throughout history, from the battlefields of WW2 to the streets of 1950s Mississippi, these are dramas and action stories that focus on the power of individual choice and the strength of humanity.

programme.title: German Corner
programme.desc: A range of stand-out short films in the German language showcasing original stories, deeply layered characters, and high-quality production values. Some highly relevant themes are explored in this selection.

programme.title: Sci Fi

programme.title: Intimate Drama
programme.desc: A focus on character-driven stories that leave an emotional impact through quietly powerful storytelling, often with a deeper social or psychological message beneath the surface.

programme.title: Crime
programme.desc: A varied selection of films whose stories all have crime at their core in some form or another, whether subtextual or directly related to the plot, this is an impressive range of stories from around the world.

programme.title: Family Drama
programme.desc: Dramatic stories with broader and sometimes more accessible themes for everyone, this collection of shorts includes everything from family comedy, and animation to heavier hitting, gritty storytelling.

programme.title: Documentaries
programme.desc: A wide range of compelling and informative documentaries taking you to different parts of the world and exploring themes such as the environment, health, dance, art, and social issues.

programme.title: In Search of True Love
programme.desc: An eclectic collection of stories sharing the love as their common thread. Whether unrequited, ill-matched, or a soulmate connection, all aspects of love are explored in these films.

programme.title: White God
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Lili fights to protect her dog Hagen. She is devastated when her father eventually sets Hagen free on the streets. Still innocently believing love can conquer any difficulty, Lili sets out to find her dog and save him.

programme.title: Paper Year
programme.desc: Young newlyweds encounter a series of challenges during the first year of their marriage.

programme.title: Celebrity
programme.desc: Open to temptation, the self-centred travel writer and would-be novelist, Lee Simon, divorces his English teacher wife, Robin, after sixteen years. Eager and anxious to rub shoulders with the rich and famous, Lee moves in trendy circles in high hopes of picking up supermodels however, his love life--as well as his ambitious screenplay--remain a big mess. Then, unexpectedly, Robin has a chance encounter with the charismatic TV producer, Tony Gardella, who's the bee's knees, and summons up the courage to get her life together. Is this divine intervention? But, either way, will Lee ever grow up, and stop using women like stepping stones?

programme.title: Deconstructing Harry
programme.desc: Harry Block is a well-regarded novelist whose tendency to thinly-veil his own experiences in his work, as well as his un-apologetic attitude and his proclivity for pills and whores, has left him with three ex-wives that hate him. As he is about to be honored for his writing by the college that expelled him, he faces writer's block and the impending marriage of his latest flame to a writer friend. As scenes from his stories and novels pass and interact with him, Harry faces the people whose lives he has affected - wives, lovers, his son, his sister.

programme.title: 24 Hours To Kill
programme.desc: A plane bound for Athens is forced to spend 24 hours in Beirut after an engine failure. A member of the crew gets mixed up in transporting stolen goods, which brings him to the attention of a ruthless smuggler. It falls to the pilot to protect his friend from the criminal and his gang.

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: An art dealer must recover a stolen painting containing the code to a lost bank account filled with Nazi gold.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an assassin in love. But a picture-perfect marriage will not save the couple from becoming targets.

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: THE SPIRIT takes us on a sinister, gut-wrenching ride with a hero who is born, murdered and born again.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Wanting to get his life back on track, a down on his luck ex-soccer star begins coaching his son's sports team

programme.desc: A rom-com about the adventures of a small town teacher, Kate Carter, going back to the city for her wedding. After a blizzard strikes, she is forced to travel with a stranger named Redford who leaves her questioning her future plans.

programme.title: One Last Dance
programme.desc: In the wake of tragedy, a renowned NY dance company is on the brink of collapse. After leaving the dance world for good, Travis, Chrissa and Max have one last chance to re-connect with the passion and prove that miracles really can happen.

programme.title: What Happened Last Night
programme.desc: Two college students, Danny and Sarah, are strangers until they wake up together after a night of partying. Told in reverse time order, the story follows what happened the night before.

programme.title: The Contender
programme.desc: Senator Laine Hanson is a contender for U.S. Vice President, but information and disinformation about her past surfaces that threatens to derail her confirmation.

programme.title: The Captor
programme.desc: Starring Ethan Hawke and Noomi Rapace and from the executive producer of BlacKkKlansman, this thrilling crime caper is based on the absurd but true story of the 1973 Stockholm bank heist. Outlaw Lars takes two workers hostage and demands his friend is released from prison, $1 million and a getaway car. As negotiations reach deadlock, hostage Bianca becomes strangely attracted to her captor.

programme.title: Once More
programme.desc: From acclaimed director Rob Reiner (When Harry Met Sally) comes a heart-warming, inspirational film about finding yourself again and learning to let others in. Frustrated writer, Monte Wildhorn, takes a lakeside cabin for the summer to rekindle his passion for writing. While there he befriends the family next door who help him to find inspiration again. Starring Academy Award Winner Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Pinocchio
programme.desc: Inspiring the world to believe that dreams really can come true, comes this enchanting take on the timeless and much adored classic. When a piece of pine-wood falls into the hands of the poor old toy-maker Geppetto, he carves it into a puppet named Pinocc

programme.title: Ozzy
programme.desc: Put your paws up and go “mutts” for Ozzy’s adventure! Ozzy's family decide to go on a holiday but no dogs are allowed! Unable to bring their beloved beagle, they settle on a top-of-the-line canine spa called Blue Creek. But when the hotel turns out to be a prison, Ozzy and his new friends must team up to escape and return home. Join Ozzy on an adventure of a lifetime with all the family!

programme.desc: Walk This Way | Bloomin' Emergency | I Would Walk 500 Miles Munki and Trunk is a tree-crashing, rock-smashing, water-splashing, fruit-mashing knockabout comedy adventure! Munki (a bold, banana-juggling adventurer) and Trunk (a big-hearted and optimistic elephant) are best friends. They do everything together - swinging, stomping and somersaulting as they explore their jungle world, hatching plans, solving problems, having fun and helping friends along the way.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: Eric Lombard is at a crossroads - does he continue to pursue his long-shot dream of playing professional football, or does he start the next phase of his life, and apply to law school? As he struggles with this decision, Eric - along with his longtime girlfriend, Colleen - visits his cousin in Florence. There, to his surprise, he gets involved with the ancient local sport of Calcio Storico - and everything that Eric has assumed about his life is challenged.

programme.title: Mozart and the Whale
programme.desc: A charming and heartfelt romantic drama starring Josh Hartnett and Radha Mitchell. New York taxi driver Donald Morton has Asperger's syndrome, a type of autism. Proficient with numbers but shy around people, Donald organizes a support group for others with his condition. Isabelle Sorenson, who is direct to a fault and practical, but easily upset by any perceived insult, joins the group. The two fall in love, but their mutual difficulty in coping with their condition threatens their fragile relationship.

programme.title: The Immigrant
programme.desc: Marion Cotillard, Joaquin Phoenix, and Jeremy Renner star in the story of Ewa, a recent immigrant to America who falls prey to a charming but wicked man who forces her into prostitution.

programme.title: Love Me Like You Do
programme.desc: Ryan Brenner is a traveling musician, and Jackie Laurel is a fallen country music star who is a recently single mother, battling to hold on to her young daughter. When the free-spirited pair meet by chance, they soon form an unlikely relationship that will teach them to trust and love again, and may change their lives forever.

programme.title: Life at These Speeds
programme.desc: We all have those memories. Indelible, perfect memories that make you glow with happiness. Like the way the sun shone off her hair the morning you met her or the sound of your best friend’s laughter after an inside joke or your coach’s inspiring speech or daydreaming with the love of your life about your future together. After a teenager's friends are killed in an accident, he finds running allows him to remember them perfectly. Running however also brings him notoriety. Soon he finds himself caught between keeping the past alive and making new memories in the present.

programme.title: Gutshot Straight
programme.desc: A professional poker player falls deep into the underworld when he takes an unexpected wager from a mysterious high roller. In order to protect himself and his family, he must try and get to the truth as he’s forced into a murder plot making him the prime target for revenge. This action thriller’s star cast includes George Eads (TV's CSI), AnnaLynne McCord (TV's 90210), Steven Seagal (A Good Man, Hard to Kill), Vinnie Jones (Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels, Snatch), Stephen Lang (Avatar), Tia Carrere (Wayne’s World, True Lies) and Ted Levine (American Gangster, Shutter Island).

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: Set in the very near future, an elite squad of highly trained marines, led by commanding officer Captain Bukes, are sent on a routine training exercise to a remote island, from which all communications have been cut off. Accompanying them on the mission is 'tech head' Specialist Mills, a mysterious coder whose brain is interfaced with a computer. When they reach the island, the unit soon discover they are not alone and the exercise is far from routine. They become live targets of terrifyingly advanced military robots and begin to suspect that Mills is somehow involved in the conspiracy. But without the help of Mill's technology, they know they won't survive.

programme.title: Moonwalkers
programme.desc: What if Apollo 11 never actually made it? What if, in reality, Stanley Kubrick secretly shot the famous images of the moon landing in a studio, working for the US administration? This is the premise of a totally plausible conspiracy theory that takes us to swinging sixties London, where a stubborn CIA agent will never find Kubrick but instead is forced to team up with a lousy manager of a seedy rock band to develop the biggest con of all time, in this riotous, high-tempo action-comedy.

programme.title: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon
programme.desc: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon is a “jaws”-dropping action thriller from the director of Kickboxer starring John Barrowman and Jenny McShane. When two researchers discover a colossal shark's tooth off the Mexican coast their worst fears surface - the most menacing beast to ever rule the waters is still alive and mercilessly feeding on anything that crosses its path.

programme.title: Witchville
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, Erik and Jason seek out his compatriot Malachy and force him to return to his homeland. When they arrive, they find that Malachy's father, the King, is dead and their lands are completely devastated. Both seek revenge against the Evil Red Queen.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard, Anti-Life) a New York City cop at rock bottom. But when he's assigned to escort a petty criminal to testify before the grand jury, a violent turn of events means this down-and-out cop needs to pull it together to save not only the life of the witness but his own as they are hunted across the city. The clock is ticking in this exhilarating race against time. Will justice be served or will there be two more bodies to add to the crime toll of the city?
